Question.Subject: Are there any websites like theslap.com for kids for 8-13 yrs old!?
Question.ChosenAnswer: minclips.com is very good for fun games including clib penguin addictinggames.com is also very good for online game nick.co.uk is good for looking at the tv shows and characters disney.com is also another good site isketch.net is a good interactive version of pictionary

Answer.Content: minclips.com is very good for fun games including clib penguin addictinggames.com is also very good for online game nick.co.uk is good for looking at the tv shows and characters disney.com is also another good site isketch.net is a good interactive version of pictionary
